project_name.justification: The text states the company has an option to earn an interest in the 'South Contact Zone Project'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'Green Bridge Metals Corporation (CNSX:GRBM) ("Green Bridge " or the "Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The press release is signed by '"David Suda" President and Chief Executive Officer' of Green Bridge Metals.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states 'the Company has an option to earn an 80% interest in the 8,460-hectare (84.6 square kilometre (km)) South Contact Zone Project'.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as 'targeting copper (Cu), nickel (Ni)-platinum group element (PGE) mineralization.' The authoritative metadata specifies Cu as primary.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Green Bridge Metals Corporation Options World Class Copper-Nickel Exploration Portfolio in Duluth Complex Minnesota' and discusses the option agreement for the South Contact Zone Project.

currency.justification: The table outlining the work expenditures is explicitly labeled 'Work Expenditures (US$)'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: To earn the final 80% interest, one of the conditions is 'Making a cash payment of $4,000,000 to EMI.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The option terms are based on exploration expenditures and a cash payment, with no mention of share payments as part of the consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The option terms are broken down into exploration expenditures and a cash payment, not a single combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The option terms do not mention the issuance of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No option payments are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The option terms do not mention the issuance of shares, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is defined by a monetary value, not by a number of meters to be drilled.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total exploration commitment is the sum of the 60% earn-in requirement ('funding Expenditures on the SCZ Properties totaling $12,650,000') and the 80% earn-in requirement ('Funding an additional $10,000,000 of Expenditures on the SCZ Properties').

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: There is no mention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) in the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text describes the project as the '8,460-hectare (84.6 square kilometre (km)) South Contact Zone Project'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text describes the project as the '8,460-hectare (84.6 square kilometre (km)) South Contact Zone Project'.

resource_size.justification: A historical resource is mentioned for the Titac property, which is part of the South Contact Zone project: 'Titac has the most advanced exploration with a NI 43-101, inferred resource of 45.1 million tonnes averaging 15% TiO25.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Green Bridge Metals Corporation(CNSX:GRBM)'. CNSX is the Canadian Securities Exchange (CSE), which is also listed in the detailed quote section: 'Exchange: CSE'.
